During the last months I had the chance to develop the graphic identity for the event #ciudadesdemocraticas,   the technologies for participation festival held in #Madrid 6-18 nov. including #consulcon17 and #icdemocracia17, organised by @participalab and @medialabprado. 
As crazy and demanding as fun, my biggest project so far, and with the best showroom possible at @teatroespanol_madrid. Very happy with the results and hoping to do better next time!

Special thanks to Alvaro Minguito for his great pictures of all it!

At its peak, Dafen was jam-packed with sizeable, factory-like studios, all employing Huangâs production line process. Individual workers each focused on a specific compositional elementâbackground details, or eyes, or treesâdutifully painting their part and then passing the canvas along the chain.

Guateque in-Capaz interviene, experimenta e invade las infraestructuras urbanas mediante una serie de instalaciones que obligan al transeÃºnte a abandonar sus rutas habituales con el fin de concienciar sobre la diversidad funcional, la accesibilidad y la movilidad en la ciudad, siempre desde un enfoque lÃºdico y festivo.  

Ciudad-Guateque es el resultado final de una intensa semana de trabajo colaborativo en el taller Interactivos?17, organizado por  Medialab-Prado. Â¡AquÃ­ podÃ©is ver lo bien que nos lo pasamos!

Gracias al equipazo formado por Natasha Trujillo, Irene Almazan, Hugo Zeta, Amaya Pou, Saulo David Gonzalez, Junior Paladines, Jonathan Ros y Elisa Cuesta Fernandez.

Hello all! Interactivos?17 is an open workshop which aims to re-image the movements in the cities through the tools offered by citizen science, technology and collaborative processes. Interactivos is run by Medialab-Prado, here in Madrid, and the call for collaborators is open right now for anyone willing to participate! 

8 projects have been selected to be developed between 17th and 31st of may! My project âGuatequeâ which I run with Natasha Trujillo is amongst them, and we need help to make it happen!

During two weeks art, technology, science and people from all over the world will be thinking, working and prototyping together!

SO, I tag you here because I think you will be genuinely  interested and you will for sure come to Madrid and join us! (If not... help us spread the word!). See you soon!
